direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods search for elements with specific attribute values, but getElementsByAttributeValueMatching uses a regular expression for more flexible matching.
Both methods involve attribute value checks, but getElementsByAttributeValueNot excludes elements with the specified attribute value.
